# RoomBuilder.BuildError

**Enumeration**

Errors that can occur during captured room-data processing.

## Declaration

```swift
enum BuildError
```

## Overview

The room builder ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomBuilder]) function [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomBuilder/capturedRoom(from:)] can throw an error of this type.

## Interpreting the error cause

- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.insufficientInput**: An error that indicates the framework expects more captured room data.
- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.invalidInput**: An error that indicates the framework encounters invalid captured room data.
- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.exceedSceneSizeLimit**: An error that indicates when the scene size grows past the framework’s limitations.
- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.internalError**: An error that indicates when the framework encounters an unexpected error case.
- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.deviceNotSupported**: An error that indicates that the framework doesn’t support the user’s device.

## Inspecting error information

- **errorDescription**: A human-readable explanation of the error.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Error
- Hashable
- LocalizedError
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
